channel.title: Art Gallery - Now Update With New Style
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/2powi75.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i16.tinypic.com/2di2agk.png[/img][/center] [center]Last updated on: April 21, 2007[/center]
[center][url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i14.tinypic.com/2s1kbk8.png[/img][/url][IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/2ltique.png[/img][url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i14.tinypic.com/2s1kbk8.png[/img][/url][/center] [center][url=http://davesh.freehostia.com/Movies-Hand%20eye%20coordination.html]This Week's game include...[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ddMowxKchko]This Week's movie include...[/url][/center] [u][b]-=-Working On Private Server Now - Bad News-=-[/b][/u] Sigh, on my report card I made and average of 70 which is not good for the grade I am in. It means I have 1 last chance to get and average of 80 to pass to the 9th grade. I know I said I would be back, but my promise has been broken from school and to you. Good Bye All and hope you too pass on to the next grade. I love you!
[u][b]-=-INCLUDES: Mean While-=-[/b][/u] I am offline till june or so on I think because of bad grades :(.
[center][b]Note: Clicking this will bring you to my forum.[/b][/center] [center][size=15pt][u][b]Sigs [/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i13.tinypic.com/3zlsn6q.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i17.tinypic.com/2prz2ip.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i17.tinypic.com/358pibs.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/4doyav4.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i19.tinypic.com/2yv71bm.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/2d9bswo.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/312z0h1.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/2zdodxs[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i19.tinypic.com/4boazw6.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/47imusj.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/2hfkmpw.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i17.tinypic.com/33pcyzo.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i14.tinypic.com/2w7jo28.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i16.tinypic.com/2di2agk.png[/img][/url]
[size=15pt][u][b]Logo's [/b][/u][/size] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/30jjxwy.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/2i9nmu0.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.freewebs.com/noo-orleans/Enter.htm/][IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/2sbpjc5.png[/img] [/url][/center]

item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Greek Line:

back from TCAP all!

This isn’t a thread about your personal life and we don’t really care… All your doing is bumping your old posts…

Which you should get reported for…

Read full topic

item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Greek Line:

I never bumped…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 03:52:58 PM[/size][hr]Please read…very important all.

Bumping = Bring up your post, so you carry on posting so people will post/read!

Therefor, you have bumped this about 6 times.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:55, topic:76712”][quote author=Greek Line link=topic=112578.msg1199093#msg1199093 date=1177271507]

Lol you can have the sig…idc thats why I didnt put name :P. It suck to me because I didnt have the time to make BG[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 02:14:08 PM[/size][hr]Any other comment?

Stop bumping this, if people want to rate, they will rate.

Bump?
[/quote]

Bump = Bring Up My Post, Because people post BUMP to get there thread to the top of the board, but it’s against the ToS here.[/quote]

And its just annoying.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Greek Line:

Thats old dude…you quoted a old post which was a long time ago lolz…

So what? I’m making sure you understand that if someone is harsh about your work its for a reason and someone criticizing you helps you to improve.

Read full topic

item.title: Art Gallery - Now Update With New Style
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Greek Line, post:19, topic:76712”]Thats how your life will be… Dont worry about my life K? I can draw…so if I ever do give up computer art I can go sketch someone and make 70$ quick.

TYVM![br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 05:02:11 PM[/size][hr]Anyone else wanna complement please?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 03:49:39 PM[/size][hr]Cmon…ALl these views…wtf?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 05:37:23 PM[/size][hr]I’m bored…Got nothen to do but make art :(.[/quote]

You can’t ask people to compliment your work! People will criticize your work and from that you will learn. You will get compliments if people like your work but what your basically saying is don’t point out flaws and just applaud me for my work.

Read full topic
item.source: Art Gallery - Now Update With New Style

item.title: Art Gallery - Now Update With New Style
item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.description:
@Greek_Line wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:40, topic:76712”][quote author=Suede link=topic=112578.msg1180641#msg1180641 date=1176981728]

Suede, you suck at gfx, post a sig with all the points you put in there, and you’ll get a round of applause, but you suck, plain and simple, hypocrite.

Meh… Why are you critting me? I gave this guy a couple of advices!
Fair and square, I’m not the best at this, so I do one important thing, I dont brag!
I’m telling this guy the truth, he has much to learn, so do I, but I’m sharing the experience I’ve had in my short period of Photoshopping, to help him.
Please stop flaming constructive criticism, considering the second part of my message didn’t incluse any degrading comments or flaming words.
(You might have taken offence since you done some of the tuts on here, though yours and FB’s are the higher class tuts, wich a beginner wouldnt understand, one reason, you dont explain things, you work with good techniques but dont explain how to do them.)
I think i read FB’s smokin tag tut or something and it said add a clipping mask, and I was like “What the heck is a clipping mask??” though I learned that and did the tut later, perdy nice outcome btw
[/quote]

No i was only flaming you because you said this forum sucked for gfx, fuck off back to planetrenders you hypocrit…[/quote]
owned.

Read full topic
item.source: Art Gallery - Now Update With New Style

Fair and square, I’m not the best at this, so I do one important thing, I dont brag!
I’m telling this guy the truth, he has much to learn, so do I, but I’m sharing the experience I’ve had in my short period of Photoshopping, to help him.
Please stop flaming constructive criticism, considering the second part of my message didn’t incluse any degrading comments or flaming words.
(You might have taken offence since you done some of the tuts on here, though yours and FB’s are the higher class tuts, wich a beginner wouldnt understand, one reason, you dont explain things, you work with good techniques but dont explain how to do them.)
I think i read FB’s smokin tag tut or something and it said add a clipping mask, and I was like “What the heck is a clipping mask??” though I learned that and did the tut later, perdy nice outcome btw :)[/quote]

No i was only flaming you because you said this forum sucked for gfx, fuck off back to planetrenders you hypocrit…
